LayoutNode.Content: TOP TIPS: MIGRATING FROM GOOGLEURL SHORTENER TO BITLY
LayoutNode.SRC: Top Tips: Migrating from Google URL Shortener to Bitly

LayoutNode.Content: Google recently announced they will shut down their URL shortener, Goo.gl.
LayoutNode.SRC: Google recently announced they will shut down their URL shortener, Goo.gl.

LayoutNode.Content: Google will cease service for any new or anonymous users on April 13. Although existing users can continue to use the goo.gl console through March 2019, there’s no time like the present to start shortening, branding, tracking, and integrating with the world’s leading Link Management Platform!
LayoutNode.SRC: Google will cease service for any new or anonymous users on April 13. Although existing users can continue to use the goo.gl console through March 2019, there’s no time like the present to start shortening, branding, tracking, and integrating with the world’s leading Link Management Platform!Google will cease service for any new or anonymous users on April 13. Although existing users can continue to use the goo.gl console through March 2019, there’s no time like the present to start shortening, branding, tracking, and integrating with the world’s leading Link Management Platform!

LayoutNode.Content: With Bitly, you’ll get the functionality Google’s URL shortener offered and much more. Here are some tips to get you up-and-running:
LayoutNode.SRC: With Bitly, you’ll get the functionality Google’s URL shortener offered and much more. Here are some tips to get you up-and-running:With Bitly, you’ll get the functionality Google’s URL shortener offered and much more. Here are some tips to get you up-and-running:

LayoutNode.Content: Brand and Customize your Short Links
LayoutNode.SRC: Brand and Customize your Short Links

LayoutNode.Content: Chances are you’ve been shortening links to make them easier to remember, fit into a certain word count, or simply to make long, bulky URLs look nice and sleek. Take your links one step further by branding and customizing them.
LayoutNode.SRC: Chances are you’ve been shortening links to make them easier to remember, fit into a certain word count, or simply to make long, bulky URLs look nice and sleek. Take your links one step further by branding and customizing them.Chances are you’ve been shortening links to make them easier to remember, fit into a certain word count, or simply to make long, bulky URLs look nice and sleek. Take your links one step further by branding and customizing them.Chances are you’ve been shortening links to make them easier to remember, fit into a certain word count, or simply to make long, bulky URLs look nice and sleek. Take your links one step further by branding and customizing them.

LayoutNode.Content: Brand
In Bitly you can set up your own custom domain, called a “Branded Short Domain,” to replace the generic “bit.ly” with something that more closely reflects your brand.
LayoutNode.SRC: In Bitly you can set up your own custom domain, called a “Branded Short Domain,” to replace the generic “bit.ly” with something that more closely reflects your brand.In Bitly you can set up your own custom domain, called a “Branded Short Domain,” to replace the generic “bit.ly” with something that more closely reflects your brand.

LayoutNode.Content: Branded Bitly links not only adds a level of professionalism to your online presence, but also promises to increase your clicks and engagement over standard short URLs. One study we conducted with Beats by Dre showed branded links receive a 34% higher click-through rate !
LayoutNode.SRC: Branded Bitly links not only adds a level of professionalism to your online presence, but also promises to increase your clicks and engagement over standard short URLs. One study we conducted with Beats by Dre showed branded links receive a Branded Bitly links not only adds a level of professionalism to your online presence, but also promises to increase your clicks and engagement over standard short URLs. One study we conducted with Beats by Dre showed branded links receive a Branded Bitly links not only adds a level of professionalism to your online presence, but also promises to increase your clicks and engagement over standard short URLs. One study we conducted with Beats by Dre showed branded links receive a 34% higher click-through rate34% higher click-through rate!

LayoutNode.Content: Here are some other examples we love:
LayoutNode.SRC: Here are some other examples we love:

LayoutNode.Content: – Bitly uses bitly.is, so we can create links like bitly.is/everywhere
LayoutNode.SRC: – Bitly uses bitly.is, so we can create links like bitly.is/everywhere

LayoutNode.Content: – Red Bull & Nike made domains out of their slogans, win.gs and swoo.sh, respectively
LayoutNode.SRC: – Red Bull & Nike made domains out of their slogans, win.gs and swoo.sh, respectively

LayoutNode.Content: – Vissla chooses to use a domain that mimics the company name, viss.la
LayoutNode.SRC: – Vissla chooses to use a domain that mimics the company name, viss.la

LayoutNode.Content: – TD Bank pushes the website subdomain, go.td.com
LayoutNode.SRC: – TD Bank pushes the website subdomain, go.td.com

LayoutNode.Content: – Cleveland Clinic breaks out the city, the brand, and its purpose all in one link: cle.clinic
LayoutNode.SRC: – Cleveland Clinic breaks out the city, the brand, and its purpose all in one link: cle.clinic

LayoutNode.Content: Customize

When you shorten a URL through Bitly, you can switch out the randomly generated letters in the back-half of the link and customize the text. Any Bitly link can be customized by clicking the “edit” button next to the link.
LayoutNode.SRC: When you shorten a URL through Bitly, you can switch out the randomly generated letters in the back-half of the link and customize the text. Any Bitly link can be customized by clicking the “edit” button next to the link. When you shorten a URL through Bitly, you can switch out the randomly generated letters in the back-half of the link and customize the text. Any Bitly link can be customized by clicking the “edit” button next to the link. When you shorten a URL through Bitly, you can switch out the randomly generated letters in the back-half of the link and customize the text. Any Bitly link can be customized by clicking the “edit” button next to the link.

LayoutNode.Content: Customizing a link tells your audience what they’re getting and makes it much easier to remember and type. Nonprofits can experiment with /donate or /volunteers , a finance company could try /invest or /banking , or healthcare could use /HeartHealth101 or /insurancepolicyFAQ .
LayoutNode.SRC: Customizing a link tells your audience what they’re getting and makes it much easier to remember and type. Nonprofits can experiment with Customizing a link tells your audience what they’re getting and makes it much easier to remember and type. Nonprofits can experiment with /donate or /volunteers, a finance company could try , a finance company could try /invest or /banking, or healthcare could use /HeartHealth101 or /insurancepolicyFAQ.

LayoutNode.Content: The Upshot: When you turn links into brand assets, you create consistent experiences The Upshot: The Upshot: across channels, build trust with your audience, and provide context for every piece of content shared.
LayoutNode.SRC: The Upshot: When you turn links into brand assets, you create consistent experiencesThe Upshot: The Upshot: across channels, build trust with your audience, and provide context for every piece ofcontent shared.

LayoutNode.Content: Track Each Link and *All* Links
LayoutNode.SRC: Track Each Link and *All* Links

LayoutNode.Content: A click means someone is engaged with your product or content. Which social channel is driving the most traffic? What about email, mobile, print, and display ads?
LayoutNode.SRC: A click means someone is engaged with your product or content. Which social channel is driving the most traffic? What about email, mobile, print, and display ads? A click means someone is engaged with your product or content. Which social channel is driving the most traffic? What about email, mobile, print, and display ads?

LayoutNode.Content: Bitly offers a clean, intuitive way to see how your links are performing at both an individual link level and as a whole.
LayoutNode.SRC: Bitly offers a clean, intuitive way to see how your links are performing at both an individual link level and as a whole.Bitly offers a clean, intuitive way to see how your links are performing at both an individual link level and as a whole.

LayoutNode.Content: Here’s a peek at the data you can see in your Bitly account:
LayoutNode.SRC: Here’s a peek at the data you can see in your Bitly account:

LayoutNode.Content: Individual Link Data
LayoutNode.SRC: Individual Link Data

LayoutNode.Content: If you’re coming from goo.gl, this is similar to the info you’re used to: All-time clicks for each link you’ve created, a timeline, and specific referrer channel and location details. What’s great about Bitly is that all this data populates in real time, and you can see how much traffic your short link generated vs. organic traffic to the same destination URL from other users.

LayoutNode.Content: Overall Link Performance
LayoutNode.SRC: Overall Link Performance

LayoutNode.Content: When you want to understand your results and engagement trends at a higher-level, Bitly allows you to do so with three key elements:
LayoutNode.SRC: When you want to understand your results and engagement trends at a higher-level, Bitly allows you to do so with three key elements: When you want to understand your results and engagement trends at a higher-level, Bitly allows you to do so with three key elements:

LayoutNode.Content: – Summary Graph: An interactive chart displaying the links you’ve created and their – Summary Graph: – Summary Graph: overall performance for the past 30 days. Filter by date range, tags, custom, or hidden links.

LayoutNode.Content: – Top Referrers: The top referring digital channels – from social media channels and “dark” traffic to YouTube and partners.
LayoutNode.SRC: – Top Referrers:The top referring digital channels – from social media channels and “dark” traffic to YouTube and partners.The top referring digital channels – from social media channels and “dark” traffic to YouTube and partners.

LayoutNode.Content: – Top Locations: The top locations from which your audience is clicking, broken down and measured by country.
LayoutNode.SRC: – Top Locations: The top locations from which your audience is clicking, broken down and measured by country.The top locations from which your audience is clicking, broken down and measured by country.

LayoutNode.Content: Integrate Bitly into Your Workflow
LayoutNode.SRC: Integrate Bitly into Your Workflow

LayoutNode.Content: Like most tools, a Link Management Platform is only as useful as you make it. If you’re shortening links sporadically and keeping Bitly data in a silo, you may be missing the bigger picture.
LayoutNode.SRC: Like most tools, a Link Management Platform is only as useful as you make it. If you’re shortening links sporadically and keeping Bitly data in a silo, you may be missing the bigger picture.Like most tools, a Link Management Platform is only as useful as you make it. If you’re shortening links sporadically and keeping Bitly data in a silo, you may be missing the bigger picture.Like most tools, a Link Management Platform is only as useful as you make it. If you’re shortening links sporadically and keeping Bitly data in a silo, you may be missing the bigger picture.

LayoutNode.Content: That doesn’t mean you have to spend extra time on the platform to maximize your results. Integrating Bitly into your current workflow and tech stack is as easy as it gets.

LayoutNode.Content: Bitly Extension & App
LayoutNode.SRC: Bitly Extension & App

LayoutNode.Content: Our nifty extension is available to all users on Chrome, Firefox and Safari browsers. Once installed, just click on the icon and automatically shorten, brand and share whatever web page you’re on directly to your social channels. Similarly our iOS and Android apps allow you to create and share links, plus view your analytics on the go. Download the Bitly extension and app here .

LayoutNode.Content: A/B Testing
LayoutNode.SRC: A/B Testing

LayoutNode.Content: By using different Bitlinks to A/B test each CTA’s shares and clicks, the team at Social Quant determines the best channels, times to post, and types of content for its customers. “This data helps us maximize our Twitter marketing and has helped our startup get over 25,000 visitors a month just from Twitter,” said Social Quant CEO Mike Kawula.

LayoutNode.Content: Influencer Marketing ROI
LayoutNode.SRC: Influencer Marketing ROI

LayoutNode.Content: It’s notoriously hard to measure return from Influencer Marketing programs, but giving an individual link to each influencer is a great way to do it. During HP’s #AwakenYourForce sweepstakes, which was promoted by Instagram influencers, one partner’s creative take on the challenge drove thousands of clicks, making him a go-to choice for future promotions.

LayoutNode.Content: Operational Messaging & SMS
LayoutNode.SRC: Operational Messaging & SMS

LayoutNode.Content: One popular fast food chain received 20-40,000 email requests for help with passwords each day. They built an SMS password reset program using branded short links through the Bitly API, and have since reduced email support volume by 66%, putting less strain on internal resources and more self-service options for their customers.
